name: Sleeping Dogs: Nightmare in North Point
name_original: Sleeping Dogs: Nightmare in North Point
description:
Sleeping Dogs: Nightmare in North Point is an action, shooter and racing game developed by United Front Games. It came out on 30-10-2012. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Sleeping Dogs: Nightmare in North Point is available on Xbox 360, PC and PlayStation 3.
